chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
si: sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
taifoi: terms_and_indices_from_one_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> (forall (h : Net.name) (e1 e2 : entry), In e1 entries -> In e2 (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 entries -> In e3 (log (snd (nwState net h)))) /\ (prevLogIndex <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = prevLogIndex /\ eTerm e4 = prevLogTerm /\ In e4 (log (snd (nwState net h))))) /\ (forall i : nat, prevLogIndex < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e entries) /\ (forall e : entry, In e entries -> prevLogIndex < eIndex e)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation leaderId := (RaftState.leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
term = nat : Set
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed,
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
logIndex = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data.
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
eTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, eTerm, _) := e in eTerm : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> term Arguments eTerm {orig_base_params raft_params}
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_scratch : forall (es ys : list entry) (plt : term), sorted es -> uniqueIndices ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (0 <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = 0 /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex es -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e es) ->...-> entries_match es ys
entries_match_append : forall (xs ys es : list entry) (ple : entry) (pli : nat) (plt : term), sorted xs -> sorted ys -> sorted es -> entries_match xs ys -> (forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ys -> (forall e3 : entry, eIndex e3 <= eIndex e1 -> In e3 es -> In e3 ys) /\ (pli <> 0 -> exists e4 : entry, eIndex e4 = pli /\ eTerm e4 = plt /\ In e4 ys)) ->...-> entries_match (es ++ removeAfterIndex xs pli) ys
leaderLogs_entries_match_nw = fun net : network => forall (h : Net.name) (llt : term) (ll : list entry) (p : packet) (t : term) (src : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In (llt, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t src pli plt es ci -> forall e1 e2 : entry, eIndex e1 = eIndex e2 -> eTerm e1 = eTerm e2 -> In e1 es -> In e2 ll ->...-> Prop
contiguous = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (leaderLog entries : list entry) => (prevLogIndex = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex leaderLog prevLogIndex = Some e /\ eTerm e = prevLogTerm)) /\ (forall e : entry, In e leaderLog -> eIndex e > prevLogIndex -> eIndex e <= maxIndex entries -> In e entries) /\ (forall e e' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' leaderLog -> e = e') : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params :...
lifted_log_matching_host : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h)))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0)
log_matching_hosts = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => (forall h h' : Net.name, entries_match (log (nwState net h)) (log (nwState net h'))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (i : nat), 1 <= i <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e (log (nwState net h))) /\ (forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eIndex e > 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params :...
entries_match = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (entries entries' : list entry) => forall e e' e'' : entry, eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e entries -> In e' entries' -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e -> In e'' entries < -> In e'' entries' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments entries_match {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st...
packets_gt_prevIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries ->...-> Prop Arguments packets_gt_prevIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
update_elections_data_appendEntries_log_allEntries : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (h' : name) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log (snd st) /\ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = allEntries (fst st) \/ allEntries (update_elections_data_appendEntries h st t h' pli plt es ci) = map (fun e : entry => (t...
packets_ge_prevTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt entries c -> In e entries ->...-> Prop Arguments packets_ge_prevTerm {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaderLogs_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) ->...-> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
leaderLogs_term_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (log : list entry) (e : entry), In (t, log) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e log -> eTerm e < t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
logs_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (prevT : logIndex) (prevI : term) (entries : list entry) (c : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n prevT prevI entries c -> sorted entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments logs_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface

handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
lifted_logs_sorted_nw : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (plt : logIndex) (plti : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n plt plti es ci -> sorted es
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope

maxIndex_is_max : forall (l : list entry) (e : entry), sorted l -> In e l -> maxIndex l >= eIndex e
